评论详情: Great quality, fancy-looking, and very comfy. Bought them for my vacation to Mexico, got so many compliments! Highly recommend.
Fit me, got them for a Porter Robinson concert.. 5 ft 7, 150 pounds.
The fabric is perfect, the pants are cute but I’m 5 ft 4 inches and they are a bit short
Lots of compliments I love the infusion of style and culture. The extra large fits perfectly. My measurements are 34d 30 50 hip 5'10 I weigh 2'10.
These pants are the epitome of comfort and style.  I love them!!!  They look great- lots of compliments
well constructed and very comfortable. The texture is a bit on the rougher side but not uncomfortable.

These weren't exactly what I was looking for and I didn't love the ties at the ankles but these are very good quality and a beautiful design. If you're thinking about them but think the price is too high, it isn't. These are not the same as the $20-$25 pants.
ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL! Fits perfectly, quality of materials are sturdy and beautifully designed, colors are vibrant!
Product says 100% cotton  The tag says 90% Cotton/10% Polyester

Love the way these look and I got so many compliments, plus a few laughs Oh well, the ones that laughed do not have to wear them, now do they?? I love love these but the one size does not fit all I wear a large and these fit like a med., but they do work great :) Hope this helps

Love these pants. Had to get the xl size. I bought the brown one size but the waist stitching wouldn't go past my hips😫 hopefully they start making  that color larger too. The material is thick and sturdy, but, it's not hot at all. Wore to a concert in the middle of summer and didn't break a sweat. The waist has drawstrings but you can't tell its drawstring. They are definitely worth their price as far as construction and material. Very good quality. When they make new patterns....imma buy em🤣
These are amazing I hope they can make more in other colors. I have one if the black ones too. Really sings to my gypsy soul

评论概述: Love the quality and the quirky design
评论详情: The fabric quality is very good and comfortable… unique and beautiful design…

This item is as stiff as it looks Yonkers the shape they’re going for. The material is not soft to touch like most Kurta Pajamas. Yet it is unique and I’m keeping it. I ordered to my size and I’m curvy so pls note that the waist is tight despite having the am elastic band had to wiggle in. Big booty small waist problems. The ankle is actually a slit with ties. A bit weird at first but then makes sense to adapt to all leg widths. It’s not going to be everyone’s cup of tea if you’re not used to Indian Kurta Pajamas.

As usual with the company quality of the product is really good (it's not you usual hippie "wear twice and throw out" type but very solid piece of clothing) but by design those are shorter than other versions so tall users- beware, sadly those are not for you

I love the cut, style and everything about this pant. Fabric quality is excellent and it looks really cool. Very happy with it. It’s style is so Indian as well as global hippie type. Love to flaunt it here in the summer of Switzerland and always get compliments.
It's super comfy and the quality of the product is also good.
